long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for histoin app.
Opening website every time will be time consuming so we created an extension for chrome so that you can quickly search and open your important links without any delay.

-Search from links.
-Apply categories on links.

How to use?

Using this extension is very easy!
a)Generating cloning key
1. Open histoin android app or histoin.com.
2. Open Links page
3. Click on enable cloning switch
4. You will see a cloning key, you have to copy this key.
b) Starting cloning links
1. Open histoin chrome extension
2.Click on load new links icon
3.Enter your email address and the copied cloning key.
4.Cloning will be done in few seconds

Important info:
#The cloning key is valid for only 10 minutes
#If you are making changes to the existing links or creating new links than changes are not updated in the extension. For latest changes you have to again clone the links.
#If you are entering wrong key then after entering wrong key for more than 25 times the extension will be stopped from cloning and you have to re-generate the key.

If you are facing any challenges please write us an email at support@histoin.com.

Thanks.
Team Histoin.
